system.effect: An on-fire character suffers 1d10 Energy damage (ignoring armour and Toughness) at the start of each of their turns. The character must use a Full Action and pass an Agility Test to extinguish the flames.
system.removal: Removed by passing an Agility Test as a Full Action, or by allies using a Full Action to extinguish the flames automatically.
